description:
''A Beginner's Guide To Happiness'' with Ira Israel is a unique wellness video designed to teach you everything you need to know to keep you at the high end of your happiness spectrum.

You will learn how and why your mind has a negativity bias, why meditation is so difficult, why your mind feels continuously unsatisfied like a hungry ghost, and how you can cultivate the authentic connections that correlate strongly with life-long happiness.

Ira Israel is a Licensed Psychotherapist, a Licensed Counselor, and a Certified Yoga Therapist. He graduated from the University of Pennsylvania and holds graduate degrees in Psychology, Philosophy, and Religious Studies. Ira is the creator of the Meditation Made Easy app and leads "Cultivating Meaning and Happiness through Mindfulness and Yoga" workshops at the Esalen Institute and throughout the United States.
title: A Beginner's Guide To Happiness
